text: Our vendors use your information only at our direction and in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
No one under age 18 may provide any information to or on Sugarwork.

data_type: content of knowledge transfer note mark
text: In the event that your employer becomes a customer of our Services, we will share information about your account related to usage statistics and share the content of your knowledge transfer notes, where it is clearly marked.

By registering or contacting us you are authorizing us to collect, store and use your email address and other Personal Information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
If you receive Sugarwork via your employer, they may provide us with your name, email address, office location, job title, experience level, and manager information.
We will store information such as your first name, last name, job title, department, email address and the name and email of your manager.

text: In the event that your employer becomes a customer of our Services, we will share information about your account related to usage statistics and share the content of your knowledge transfer notes, where it is clearly marked.

Sugarwork may transfer information that we collect about you to affiliated entities, or to other third parties across borders and from your country or jurisdiction to other countries or jurisdictions around the world.

In general, we use the information we have about you to offer you a more tailored experience and to respond to any requests you send us in a more comprehensive fashion.
We use this data in the following ways:

If you receive Sugarwork via your employer, they may provide us with your name, email address, office location, job title, experience level, and manager information.
We will store information such as your first name, last name, job title, department, email address and the name and email of your manager.
To access and use elements of the knowledge transfer platform, we will ask you to submit your LinkedIn profile URL or professional bio.
